description: Simple vacation-related questions to encourage basic conversation skills.

questions.question: Where do you like to go on vacation?
What is your favorite thing to do on holiday?
Do you prefer the beach or the mountains?
Have you ever gone camping?
What do you usually pack for a trip?
Do you like traveling by plane?
What is your favorite snack to bring on a trip?
Have you ever visited a famous landmark?
Do you like taking pictures when traveling?
What is your favorite season to go on vacation?
Do you like to buy souvenirs?
What is the longest trip you have been on?
Do you prefer traveling with family or friends?
Have you ever stayed in a hotel?
What is your favorite place to visit in your country?
Do you like visiting theme parks?
What is your favorite way to travel (car, train, bus)?
Have you ever traveled by train?
What do you like to do during a long trip?
Have you ever gone to a zoo on vacation?
Do you like visiting museums?
What is your favorite outdoor activity on vacation?
Do you like trying new foods when traveling?
What is your favorite drink to have on vacation?
Have you ever visited a farm?
Do you enjoy going to the beach?
Have you ever gone hiking?
Do you prefer hot or cold destinations?
What is your favorite thing to do at the beach?
Do you like visiting new cities?
What do you usually eat for breakfast on vacation?
Have you ever seen a waterfall?
What is your favorite ice cream flavor on holiday?
Do you like to relax or explore on vacation?
Have you ever visited a castle?
What is your favorite park to visit?
Do you like to swim on vacation?
What is your favorite way to enjoy nature?
Have you ever visited a famous mountain?
What do you like to do on a rainy vacation day?
Do you prefer short or long vacations?
Have you ever visited a lighthouse?
What do you like to eat at the beach?
Do you like to watch the sunset on vacation?
Have you ever gone fishing?
What is your favorite time of day on vacation?
Do you like to take naps during holidays?
Have you ever visited a desert?
What is your favorite souvenir from a trip?
Do you like to watch movies during a trip?
